Title: Dungeons and Dragons, Anyone?
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Andrew Secunda, Lacey Marisa Friedman (story editor), Aaron Kaczander (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam's conduct as gym class captain causes a rift with his nerdy friends. Beverly and Murray dash Erica's hopes of attending an out-of-state college when she leaves school.
